text: Motion
Motion
Yuika, you look sleepy, huh?

Oh?
Oops, did I get caught?

You stayed up late, huh… I thought it wasn't something
to do right before an important training camp!
Were you busy with assignments or something?

Stop it~!
If I were just playing around, it'd be unbearable!
So… were you preparing for the training camp?

I didn't pick up on that vibe of "don't pry into this", huh?
It's rare for a sharp person like you to misread things!

Well, I knew you probably didn't want me to touch on it…
But I wanted to praise Yuika for working hard.
Oh, here it comes…
So, what have you been up to?
…It's really hard to confess in this situation, you know!
Come on, don't say that.

Geez~…
I've been watching training camp footage of various idols.

Since I'm in charge of filming this time,
I wanted to think about what kind of shots would be good.

Geez! Hey, knock it off!
Don't make that 'You're amazing' face!

I wasn't doing that!
…But, "You're amazing, Yuika"!
You're so noisy!
